abstract.text: Converts a length in the specified unit
to a length in points suitable for use in the environment this
converter is associated with.

inlineContent.text: A value in points. Use this value only in the scene this

SwiftUI-PageImage-card.png.alt: A black Swift logo on a swirly blue and purple background.

abstract.text: Declare the user interface and behavior for your app on every platform.
A physical metrics converter provides conversion between point values and
their extent in 3D space, in the form of physical length measurements.
Converts a point, whose coordinates are in the specified unit,
to a point suitable for use in the environment this
converter is associated with.
Converts a
, whose coordinates are in the specified unit,
to a
with coordinates specified in points, suitable for use in the environment this
converter is associated with.
Converts a size, given in the specified unit,
to a size in points suitable for use in the environment this
converter is associated with.
Converts a length in the specified unit
to a length in points suitable for use in the environment this
converter is associated with.
Converts a point, whose coordinates are in the specified unit,
to a point value suitable for use in the environment this
converter is associated with.
Converts a size, given in the specified unit,
to a size in points suitable for use in the environment this
converter is associated with.
Converts a vector of physical length measurements, in the specified unit,
to a vector of values in points suitable for use in the environment this
converter is associated with.
Converts a rectangle, whose coordinates are in the specified unit,
to a rectangle with coordinates specified in points, suitable for use in the environment this
converter is associated with.
A type that can serve as the animatable data of an animatable type.
A structure that contains a point in a two-dimensional coordinate system.
A structure that contains the location and dimensions of a rectangle.
A structure that contains width and height values.
A rectangle in a 3D coordinate system.
A point in a 3D coordinate system.
A size that describes width, height, and depth in a 3D coordinate system.
A unit of measure for length.
The basic type for floating-point scalar values in Core Graphics and related frameworks.
A singleton actor whose executor is equivalent to the main dispatch queue.
